LanguageData.NY_CookMealChickenwithMushroom.label: cook chicken mushroom bouillon
LanguageData.NY_CookMealChickenwithMushroom.descripti: Traditionally a soup of chicken and shiitake mushroom, though due to ingredient availability in rimworld, the meat and mushroom used varies.
LanguageData.NY_CookMealChickenwithMushroomTen.label: cook chicken mushroom bouillon x10
LanguageData.NY_CookMealChickenwithMushroomTen.descri: Traditionally a soup of chicken and shiitake mushroom, though due to ingredient availability in rimworld, the meat and mushroom used varies.
LanguageData.NY_CookMealDumpling.label: cook loong dumplings
LanguageData.NY_CookMealDumpling.description: A famous loong cook declared it takes meat and vegetable to make best dumplings, so vegetarian and meat only dumplings dropped out of favor.
LanguageData.NY_CookMealDumplingTen.label: cook loong dumplings x10
LanguageData.NY_CookMealDumplingTen.description: A famous loong cook declared it takes meat and vegetable to make best dumplings, so vegetarian and meat only dumplings dropped out of favor.
LanguageData.NY_CookMealLavish_Meat.label: cook braised meat chunks
LanguageData.NY_CookMealLavish_Meat.description: A chunk of (hopefully normal) meat braised in spices. Only a vegan can say no to it.
LanguageData.NY_CookMealLavish_MeatTen.label: cook braised meat x10
LanguageData.NY_CookMealLavish_MeatTen.description: A chunk of (hopefully normal) meat braised in spices. Only a vegan can say no to it.
LanguageData.NY_CookMealLavish_Veg.label: cook vegetable stir-fry
LanguageData.NY_CookMealLavish_Veg.description: Traditionally made from leaf vegetables, though due to ingredient availability in rimworld, stir-fried potatos or even strawberries are not something unheard of.
LanguageData.NY_CookMealLavish_VegTen.label: cook vegetable stir-fry x10
LanguageData.NY_CookMealLavish_VegTen.description: Traditionally made from leaf vegetables, though due to ingredient availability in rimworld, stir-fried potatos or even strawberries are not something unheard of.
LanguageData.NY_CookMealLotusRootSlices.label: make lotus root salad
LanguageData.NY_CookMealLotusRootSlices.description: A salad made from parboiled lotus root slices, and various condiments. Some prefered it sweet, others prefered it spicy.
LanguageData.NY_CookMealLotusRootSlicesTen.label: make lotus root salad x10
LanguageData.NY_CookMealLotusRootSlicesTen.descriptio: A salad made from parboiled lotus root slices, and various condiments. Some prefered it sweet, others prefered it spicy.
LanguageData.NY_CookMealRandomShreds.label: cook potato ginger strip stir-fry x10
LanguageData.NY_CookMealRandomShreds.description: Cut potatoes and gingers into thing slices and stir-fry it. A simple yet dreaded dish intended for pranking.\n\nTen serves are made to ensure random distribution of potato and ginger.
LanguageData.NY_CookMealRandomShreds.jobString: slicing and frying potato and ginger.
LanguageData.NY_CookPlumGingerTea.label: make plum ginger milktea x10
LanguageData.NY_CookPlumGingerTea.description: Make 10 serves of plum ginger milktea
LanguageData.NY_CookPlumJuice.label: make plum juice x10
LanguageData.NY_CookPreservedPlum.label: preserve plums
LanguageData.NY_CookPreservedPlum.description: Preserve plums with salt and sugar.
